text.0: may this delightsome soma be expressed for thee by tawny stones.
text.1: joying thereat o indra with thy bay steeds come ascend thy goldencoloured car.
text.2: in love thou madest uṣas glow in love thou madest sūrya shine.
text.3: thou indra knowing thinking lord of tawny steeds above all glories waxest great.
text.4: the heaven with streams of golden hue earth with her tints of green and gold.
text.5: the golden pair yield indra plenteous nourishment between them moves the golden one.
text.6: when born to life the golden bull illumines all the realm of light.
text.7: he takes his golden weapon lord of tawny steeds the golden thunder in his arms.
text.8: the bright the wellloved thunderbolt girt with the bright indra disclosed.
text.9: disclosed the soma juice pressed out by tawny stones with tawny steeds drave forth the kine.
